price: 55. Sideedaba Gargaarahiinnu Waa Allaah, iyo Rasuulkiisa iyo kuwa rumeeyey - kuwa ooga salaadda, oo bixiya Zakada iyagoo rukuucsan (u hoggaansan Alle).
arabic: إِنَّمَا وَلِيُّكُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُۥ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤۡتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُمۡ رَٰكِعُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: innamā waliyyukumu al-lahu warasūluhu wa-alladhīna āmanū alladhīna yuqīmūna al-ṣalata wayu'tūna al-zakata wahum rākiʿūna
